root.name: Cool Boarders Pocket
root.description: Game Modes Mode Select Screen Free Ride - You can choose first A or B (with 3 unlockable courses) and choose one of twenty variations on the course.Survival - In survival mode it tracks how long you can last without losing all your life. CharactersIn Cool Boarders Pocket there are only two selectable characters. You can choose Ken or you can choose Jun.
